briefTitle: Incidence and Prognostic Significance of HER-2 Status Discordance Between Primary Breast Cancer and Paired Recurrent/Metastatic Lesions
officialTitle: Incidence and Prognostic Significance of HER-2 Status Discordance Between Primary Breast Cancer and Paired Recurrent/Metastatic Lesions
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

Patients with available HER2 status of primary breast cancer and relapse/metastases

Exclusion Criteria:

Patients with other malignancy
